response.overview: In Raunchy Road director Peter Wartmark has input a few more of his deepest sexual fantasies onto his hard drive and produced pixel-generated penises that penetrate bit-generated butts, all rendered with the use of computer animation. Here is an hour of gay hardcore animated action infused with hilarious parodies of famous movies. The new footage, made up of four segments, is the perfect follow up to Rumpenstein's Monster, which was nominated for Best Alternative Video from Adult Video News (AVN). In the first episode, "Hard Night Life", Peter uses the Faultline bar in Los Angeles for the backdrop of some wild, animated sex. Next, in "Homorassic Park", Peter shoots animated characters romping about in the wilds of Los Angeles Crest forest. In "Spider Dick" the superhero's job is never done on skyscrapers and construction sites, and finally, in "Country Cruisin'" animated figures find creative uses for an old abandoned barn.
response.title: Raunchy Road
